title: Eyebrows
description: Ideal natural eyebrows are rare. Permanent makeup allows you to give the eyebrows the exact shape, density and colour that you have been dreaming about, correct any imperfections (for example, asymmetry or uneven hair growth) and save a lot of time that you used to spend on daily makeup and regular visits to the beauty studios. We use two basic techniques or, if necessary, a combination of both.
